Formatting text into HTML can be challenging, but splitting the paragraph into individual sentences and wrapping each sentence with a <p>tag makes it much more readable and organized. Cultural shifts and societal changes, are fundamental to how we view and consume fashion. Fashion serves as a means for individuals to express their unique identity, creating a space where one can showcase their personality through clothing choices. Sustainability has emerged as an increasingly important aspect of the industry in recent years, with more designers and brands incorporating eco-friendly practices.

Sustainable fashion, defined as clothing made with environmentally sustainable methods, has gained prominence as consumers look for ways to make their impact on society smaller. The rise of e-commerce platforms further accelerates this shift towards sustainability, making it easier for people to access these products from various regions around the world.
